about_the_game:
Enjoy the relaxing, beautiful music of Nusakana; where Jazz meets Bossanova. As you explore a far away southern tropical setting, start with an exciting track welcoming you to the island, relive your journey through ups and downs, and close with an epic farewell track. All composed by Jasmine Cooper.

Features:
  • Includes 38 combined audio tracks in high quality lossless (FLAC) format.
  • An Unlocked music room, containing commentary and inspiration for each 46 track by the composer, is in the main menu.

Track List:
01. Nyanyian Pulau
02. Welcome, to Nusakana!
03. A Letter, A Train, A Change
04. Tropical Breeze
05. Tropical Breeze ~ Night
06. Gadis Yang Ceria
07. Serang!
08. Cinta Seorang Ibu
09. Walk With Me
10. Walk With Me ~ Night
11. Gadis Yang Lihai
12. Terlahir Dari Lautan
13. Terlahir Dari Lautan ~ Night
14. Friendly Faces
15. Gadis Yang Penyayang
16. Pull And Conquer
17. Seafoam and A Wink
18. Joyful Incline
19. Joyful Incline ~ Night
20. Hamparan Cendawan
21. Hamparan Cendawan ~ Night
22. Gadis Yang Menyendiri
23. What Are You Up To Now?
24. Menjatuhkan Raksasa
25. Nuansa Hijau
26. Nuansa Hijau ~ Night
27. Hollowed Whispers
28. They Say...
29. A Normal Day
30. Quite Alright
31. When I'm With You
32. Losing Touch
33. Misteri Nusakana
34. Tidak Diundang
35. Pilihan Sulit
36. Selamatkan Ratu
37. Selamat Tinggal, Nusakana
38. Where We Are Now

name: Nusakana OST

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 1700 MB available space

short_description: Enjoy the relaxing, beautiful music of Nusakana where Jazz meets Bossanova in the far away southern tropical settings composed by Jasmine Cooper. Starting with an exciting track welcoming you to the island throughout your journeys with ups and downs, closed with an epic farewell track.
